_comment_secret: Set SESSION_SECRET environment variable - do not store secrets in this file!
_comment_blocked_types: Blocked MIME types based on magic numbers. Default blocks executables and scripts.
_comment_quotas: Quotas: max_storage_bytes=100GB global, per_ip_daily_bytes=1GB/day, per_ip_daily_files=100/day, max_file_size_bytes=10GB/file. Set to 0 to disable.
